title: cageo: Geospatial data of Central America
text: basic example shows use package:
code: ## basic example code library(cageo) library(tidyverse) library(sf) library(stars)

title: cageo: Geospatial data of Central America
cageo: Geospatial data of Central America
code: ggplot() +   geom_stars(data = ca_elevation) +   scale_fill_viridis_c(name = "Altitud (m)", na.value = "transparent") +   theme_minimal()
